resources.string: Burger Queen has 2 sizes where the Super Burger is the large one and the Small burger is the small one. Please fill in to check the price of your order.

BurgerQueen is a cashier application for recording customer names, the size of the burger you want to order and also calculating the costs that the customer will pay. Copyright 2024 Mariana. All rights reserved.
Order in the name of %1$s %2$s, %3$s Size, Total Price: Rp%4$s
